description: A baselayer or midlayer for anything from ski tours to alpine ascents, or even just kicking it around camp, the Coefficient LT Bottom features Polartec® Power Grid® Fleece with a gridded interior for increased wicking performance and added breathability.
name: Black Diamond Coefficient LT Pants - Mens

specs.value: Polartec Powergrid polyester stretch grid back fleece - 90% Polyester, 10% Elastane, 119 g
